name: Slaking

passive.name: Lethargic
passive.effect: Your opponent's Pokemon have no abilities, except for Lethargic. If this Pokemon attacked last turn, it cannot attack this turn.

attacks.name: Heavy Impact
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

flavor: Huge fat dumb oaf. They've outgrown their aggressive stages in life, but the muscle is still there.
